topology: 24 GHz Radar Microstrip Circular Polarized Antenna
training_captions: Mask-style microstrip radar radiator—single or clustered patches with fine-tuning slots—providing linear polarization, a clean broadside response, and ultra-narrow FBW.
Low-profile antenna on ~1-mm substrate, solid backside ground and minimal feed length; linear-pol broadside radiation with mid realized gain, scalable upward to Ka/V/W bands by resizing.
Microstrip radar element optimized for stable boresight radiation and narrowband operation; linear polarization, moderate gain, and compact footprint suitable for 24-GHz class modules.
